data.title: SiriusXM Hits 1: Listen to Today's Hit Pop Songs
data.meta_description: SiriusXM Hits 1 brings you today's hit music in pop, hip hop, rock & R&B. Commercial-free & 24/7! Hear superstar interviews on The Morning Mash Up. Tune in now!
data.text:
Spyder Harrison shares the latest celebrity scoop, dives deep into different hit songs, and counts down the Top 30 Biggest S …

Spyder Harrison shares the latest celebrity scoop, dives deep into different hit songs, and counts down the Top 30 Biggest Songs in North America, as voted by YOU, the Hits 1 Hit-Makers. Not a Hit-Maker yet? No biggie, become a Hits 1 Hit-Maker at siriusxm.com/hits1 to vote on what makes next week's countdown.

We’ve given Ben from the Morning Mash Up an hour to recap the week the only way he knows how - dripping in sarcasm. With a n …

We’ve given Ben from the Morning Mash Up an hour to recap the week the only way he knows how - dripping in sarcasm. With a new visitor from the SiriusXM family each week, it’s the perfect accompaniment to your Saturday morning coffee, green smoothie or beer. We don’t judge.

Winner of his 5th grade spelling bee and a one-time employee of the month at McDonalds, Brady comes to Hits 1 with years of …

Winner of his 5th grade spelling bee and a one-time employee of the month at McDonalds, Brady comes to Hits 1 with years of experience in saying words into a microphone. When he’s not busy doing that, you can most likely find him walking the streets of NYC asking strangers if he can pet their dog.

In-between being a singer-songwriter, food enthusiast, and Tony Fly's co-host on Hits 1 LA, Symon brings her love for music …

In-between being a singer-songwriter, food enthusiast, and Tony Fly's co-host on Hits 1 LA, Symon brings her love for music and celebrity news on Saturday mornings. It’s like brunch with a friend…who has a big outside voice.

Growing up Lindsay enjoyed pop culture rundowns with Joan Rivers, making music videos, and imagining herself as a reality te …

Growing up Lindsay enjoyed pop culture rundowns with Joan Rivers, making music videos, and imagining herself as a reality television star. Now when her headphones aren’t on, you can find her keeping up with Kim Kardashian, trying out fitness classes, and flailing her arms at concerts.

Alex D is a cat-obsessed goof ball who loves to play make believe on stage and is a stream-watching queen! She enjoys a good …

Alex D is a cat-obsessed goof ball who loves to play make believe on stage and is a stream-watching queen! She enjoys a good living room dance party with karaoke, is always down to gab over some grub and spends WAY too much time scrolling through TikTok. Find her on Instagram, Twitter and TikTok - @alexditrolio

Born and raised in Miami, Jen traveled the south as a journalist and TV news reporter but wanted to come back home. She’s trading the camera for the mic to bring her Latin flavor, love for creating content, and enthusiasm for all things entertainment to Hits 1. When she's in self-care mode you can probably find her playing with her golden doodle, being a gym-rat, hanging out with friends, family, or traveling.

Winner of his 5th grade spelling bee and a one-time employee of the month at McDonalds, Brady comes to Hits 1 with years of experience in saying words into a microphone. When he’s not busy doing that, you can most likely find him walking the streets of NYC asking strangers if he can pet their dog.

Also appears on The Pulse

Carolina Calix, aka The Miami Mami, is a pop culture lover with a side of Cuban cafecito. When she's not trying to get her curly hair under control, she's out finding the best food spots, aligning her "chancletas, or figuring out how much an imaginary vacation would cost.

Also appears on Hits Uno

Growing up Lindsay enjoyed pop culture rundowns with Joan Rivers, making music videos, and imagining herself as a reality television star. Now when her headphones aren’t on, you can find her keeping up with Kim Kardashian, trying out fitness classes, and flailing her arms at concerts.

Also appears on BPM

A proud cat lady and resigned dork who loves to laugh and is always down to split some fries. A self-proclaimed expert in couch lounging while binging or reading. Geek out over movies, books, music, tv, and cute animal videos! Follow her @alexditrolio and come hang with her every afternoon on The Pulse and Hits 1.

Also appears on The Pulse
